ol.li: Dementia can be considered a metabolic disease of the brain
The correlation between obesity and dementia (alzheimer), 2% volume but 20% use of energy
The brain, glucose and ketones, ketones improves metabolism in brain
Toxic amyloid plaques creation, stimulated by oxidized stress
Removal of plaque: cholesterol is the meschanism. HDL cholesterol, APOE 3, APOE 4
ol.p: lowering amount of sugar and seed oil can also help here, also even when genetics play a role
